description: Returns a description of this MSK configuration.

parameters.name: Arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies an MSK configuration and all of its revisions.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the configuration.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the configuration was created.

nested_items.name: KafkaVersions
nested_items.description: The versions of Apache Kafka with which you can use this MSK configuration.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the configuration revision was created.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the configuration revision.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the configuration. The possible states are ACTIVE, DELETING, and DELETE_FAILED.
